articles.author: Helen Sullivan, Daniel Hurst, Andrew Sparrow
articles.title: Afghanistan live news: US, UK and Australia warn citizens away from Kabul airport amid terror threat - The Guardian
articles.description: US joins UK and Australia in warning against travel to Kabul airport; 1,500 Americans remain in country with less than a week left until deadline; allies begin winding up evacuations

articles.author: Traci Carl
articles.title: Some 1,500 Americans Are Still in Afghanistan, U.S. Says - The New York Times
articles.description: The U.S., U.K. and Australia warned of an unspecified threat outside the Kabul airport and told citizens to stay away. The warnings came in the last days of the U.S. evacuation, as thousands of desperate foreigners and Afghans tried to escape Taliban rule.
articles.content:
LiveUpdated Aug. 25, 2021, 8:35 p.m. ET

articles.author: Norman W. Baylor
articles.title: Biden's Plan to Give Covid-19 Vaccine Boosters to All Is Premature - Barron's
articles.description: The Biden administration has a plan to give all Americans Covid-19 vaccine boosters by late September. It risks eroding trust in public-health agencies, writes Norman W. Baylor.
